about_the_game: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up is a rat-filled, hand-drawn, 2D sidescrolling shooter with light tower defence and troop management elements complete with loads of guns, gear and gore. A “moba-lite shooter” if you will. Where you, as just a lowly RatGrunt must defeat the evil TechnoRat armies by leading your troops into battle and capturing one territory after another.

content_descriptors.notes: There are no humans featured in the game. The game is set in a world where every living creature is some kind of rat. All the violence and gore therefore is only of these animals. The game is also entirely hand drawn in a somewhat cartoony stylized look and so not photorealistic or 3D.

detailed_description: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up is a rat-filled, hand-drawn, 2D sidescrolling shooter with light tower defence and troop management elements complete with loads of guns, gear and gore. A “moba-lite shooter” if you will. Where you, as just a lowly RatGrunt must defeat the evil TechnoRat armies by leading your troops into battle and capturing one territory after another.

name: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up Demo
short_description: Be a rat. Kill the rats. Experience a small, curated slice of the rat-killing gameplay of the full game.
